title: authme插件如何修改登录信息
author: popiomk
txt_content:
各位大佬 我想问下如何修改这样的登录信息 我修改老是错误 求大佬们教教

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
popiomk 发表于 2020-3-17 23:46
# Login
login:
  command_usage: '&cUsage: /login '
这样试试
# Login
login:
  command_usage: '&cUsage: /login <password>'
  wrong_password: '&cWrong password!'
  success: '&2Successful login!'
  login_request:  '&b———————————&5&lPigeonPixel&b———————————&b=&c\n请输入/login 密码 进行登录服务器&b '                   
  timeout_error: '&4Login timeout exceeded, you have been kicked from the server, please try again!'

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 修改哪个？上传下你修改后的文件

replies.author: popiomk
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-17 23:30
修改哪个？上传下你修改后的文件
login:
    command_usage: '&cUsage: /login <password>'
    wrong_password: '&cWrong password!'
    success: '&2Successful login!'
    login_request: '&cPlease, login with the command: /login <password>'
    timeout_error: '&4Login timeout exceeded, you have been kicked from the server, please try again!'

replies.author: popiomk
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-17 23:30

replies.author: piastic
replies.txt_content: 修改massages里的messages_zhcn.yml文件（我是修改的这个，建议先对照着看看是不是这一个，如果没有就是其他的比如messages_en.yml）
